### âœ… Translation Checklist

Please confirm the following:

- [ ] All keys from `en.json` are present and translated
- [ ] JSON syntax is valid (no syntax errors, no trailing commas)
- [ ] File is saved as `[language-code].json` (e.g., `fr.json`)
- [ ] File is placed in the correct directory (`languages/` or `Mc Server Stats Bot/languages/`)
- [ ] Tested with the bot (bot starts without errors)
- [ ] Native speaker or fluent speaker translation
- [ ] Special characters and emojis are preserved correctly
